html:
** J.P.Morgan says Internet sector has outperformed the market YTD and is in stronger position than pre-pandemic

** Brokerage expects increased digitization to make internet cos more valuable and their services more essential

** "Into 2022, we generally prefer e-commerce and subscription based names over online advertising" - JPM

** Brokerage adds it expects slower growth as many cos face tough comps and move toward normalization and costs increase

** JPM expects e-commerce and subscription to see easing comps, faster growth and better operating environment; expects online ad cos to face slowing growth and some margin cuts as costs return

** JPM's top picks in the sector include mix of Amazon.com AMZN.O, Meta Platforms FB.O, Twitter Inc TWTR.N


(Reporting by Aniruddha Ghosh in Bengaluru)

(( Aniruddha.Ghosh@thomsonreuters.com ; 91 83 83 81 2416; ))
